description: This file is a configuration include file for setting specific compilation and packaging options for the VIA C3 processor target in the Yocto Project build system. It extends general x86 settings with VIA C3 specific options such as tuning flags, conflict management, and package architecture overrides.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: Checks if a variable contains a specific string, used here to determine compiler flags based on features.
